title: Mental Health Awareness Education in the Probation System: Culturally Adapted Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Emphasizes understanding mental health issues in multicultural contexts and applying probation systems.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three mental health issues arising from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can design and implement at least two practical strategies for supporting the mental health of individuals under probation.
Learners can develop culturally contextualized mental health educational materials through project-based team activities.

resources: Multicultural Mental Health Case Study Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
